song_lyrics: Nā dharvu abhimān kadīye, marvu ek palakmā... °ṭek
Kumbhakaraṇ ne Rāvaṇ sarakhā jone marī gayā,
Karī karīne dhyān jaranu, zāzu za ra ra ra ra re... 1
Hāthe haṇyo chhe Bhagwāne, chīryo cha ra ra ra ra re... 2
Dantavaktra ne vaḷī Shishupāḷ sarakhā chālyā jone,
Kansane māryo chhe kuvar kān, kampyo tha ra ra ra ra re... 3
Nārāyaṇdāsno Nāth bhajyā vin, jāsho jampurī jone,
Jamaḍāo ghaṇu karashe herān, ante a ra ra ra ra re... 4
title: Nā dharvu abhimān kadīye

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-528: Narayandas

Category: Updeshna Pad
